mutants.code:
def max_value(arr, N):
    a = []
    b = []
    for i in range(N):
        a.append(arr[i] + i)
        b.append(-arr[i] + i)
    mx = max(a)
    mn = min(a)
    mx1 = max(b)
    mn1 = min(b)
    return max(mx + mn, mx1 - mn1)

def max_value(arr, N):
    a = []
    b = []
    for i in range(N):
        a.append(arr[i] + i)
        b.append(-arr[i] + i)
    mx = max(a)
    mn = min(a)
    mx1 = max(b)
    mn1 = min(b)
    return max(mx * mn, mx1 - mn1)

def max_value(arr, N):
    a = []
    b = []
    for i in range(N):
        a.append(arr[i] + i)
        b.append(-arr[i] + i)
    mx = max(a)
    mn = min(a)
    mx1 = max(b)
    mn1 = min(b)
    return max(mx - mn, mx1 + mn1)

    a = []

def max_value(arr, N):
    a = []
    b = []
    for i in range(N):
        a.append(arr[i] - i)
        b.append(-arr[i] + i)
    mx = max(a)
    mn = min(a)
    mx1 = max(b)
    mn1 = min(b)
    return max(mx - mn, mx1 - mn1)

def max_value(arr, N):
    a = []
    b = []
    for i in range(N):
        a.append(arr[i] * i)
        b.append(-arr[i] + i)
    mx = max(a)
    mn = min(a)
    mx1 = max(b)
    mn1 = min(b)
    return max(mx - mn, mx1 - mn1)

def max_value(arr, N):
    a = []
    b = []
    for i in range(N):
        a.append(arr[i] + i)
        b.append(-arr[i] - i)
    mx = max(a)
    mn = min(a)
    mx1 = max(b)
    mn1 = min(b)
    return max(mx - mn, mx1 - mn1)

def max_value(arr, N):
    a = []
    b = []
    for i in range(N):
        a.append(arr[i] + i)
        b.append(-arr[i] * i)
    mx = max(a)
    mn = min(a)
    mx1 = max(b)
    mn1 = min(b)
    return max(mx - mn, mx1 - mn1)

def max_value(arr, N):
    a = []
    b = []
    for i in range(N):
        a.append(arr[i] + i)
        b.append(+arr[i] + i)
    mx = max(a)
    mn = min(a)
    mx1 = max(b)
    mn1 = min(b)
    return max(mx - mn, mx1 - mn1)
